problem_text_cn: 如图,半径为10的⊙A中,弦BC,ED所对的圆心角分别是∠BAC,∠EAD,若DE=12,∠BAC+∠EAD=180°,则弦BC的长等于()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in ⊙A with radius N_0, the central angles of chord BC and ED are ∠BAC and ∠EAD respectively. If DE = N_1, ∠BAC + ∠EAD = N_2, then the length of chord BC is equal to ()
raw_comment: 此题考查了圆周角定理、垂径定理、三角形中位线的性质以及勾股定理．注意掌握辅助线的作法．
